name: Coach
description: A one-on-one video coaching platform with Daily.co integration, student management, lesson planning, analytics, payments, and marketing funnel

stories.title: Initialize Coach project with Next.js and core dependencies
stories.description: Bootstrap the coaching platform with Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, and Biome. Establish the foundational architecture with responsive design and authentication-ready structure.
acceptance: Next.js app created via `bunx create-next-app@latest app --ts --tailwind --no-eslint --app --src-dir --use-bun --yes`
Changed into app directory: `cd app`
shadcn/ui initialized via `bunx shadcn@latest init -y`
Biome configured via `bun add -d @biomejs/biome && bunx biome init`
Essential shadcn components added: button, card, dialog, input, label, avatar, badge, tabs, separator, dropdown-menu
Project structure established with /src/app/(marketing), /src/app/(dashboard), /src/app/(auth) route groups
Tailwind configured with custom design tokens for brand colors and spacing
TypeScript strict mode enabled in tsconfig.json
`bun run build` completes without errors
`bunx biome check .` passes with no errors

stories.title: Configure database schema with Drizzle ORM and SQLite
stories.description: Set up the database layer with Drizzle ORM and SQLite for local development. Define core tables for users, students, lessons, payments, and analytics.
acceptance: Drizzle ORM and better-sqlite3 installed via `bun add drizzle-orm better-sqlite3 && bun add -d drizzle-kit @types/better-sqlite3`
Database schema file created at /src/lib/db/schema.ts
Users table: id, email, name, role (coach|student), avatarUrl, bio, timezone, createdAt, updatedAt
Students table: id, userId, coachId, status (active|inactive|pending), notes, createdAt
Lessons table: id, coachId, studentId, title, description, scheduledAt, duration, status (scheduled|completed|cancelled), roomUrl, recordingUrl
LessonPlans table: id, coachId, title, description, objectives, materials, isDraft, createdAt, updatedAt
Payments table: id, coachId, studentId, amount, currency, status (pending|completed|failed|refunded), stripePaymentId, createdAt
Analytics table: id, coachId, eventType, eventData (JSON), createdAt
Database connection singleton at /src/lib/db/index.ts
Drizzle config file at drizzle.config.ts with migrations directory
`bunx drizzle-kit generate` creates initial migration
`bun run build` completes without errors
